Main.Main - Class in Unnamed Package
Main.Main class creates text message and then adds image file and audio to it.

Message - Interface in Unnamed Package
interface that is used for messages
it has one method to send the message
MessageDecorator - Class in Unnamed Package
Abstract class needed for other message decorators
It aggregates Message interface to use send() method in different decorators
Using send() method to add some content to the current message
MessageDecorator(Message) - Constructor for class MessageDecorator
